name: Assault Machinegun (AMg-8)
description: The assault machinegun is designed for use on the battlefield by soldiers. This weapon is characterized by an ability to hit person-sized targets at moderate ranges (500 meters). It is capable of firing bullets and explosive projectiles.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
